title: When connecting TigerVNC through the mRemoteNG program, multiple people cannot connect at the same time.  Please let me know what is the reason.
author: mm154
body_snippet: When connecting TigerVNC through the mRemoteNG program, multiple people cannot connect at the same time.  In other words, remote access is possible one by one.  Direct remote access with Tiger VNC program allows multiple access at the same time.  When connecting to VNC remotely from mRemoteNG, please tell us why the simultaneous connection is not possible.
